All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppMain
This class is the main class that we have to execute to launch the application.
FileUtils
This class contains some static methods to manipulate text file that contains the score.
GamePageController
This class is the JavaFX controller of the 'game' page of the application.
GuessPane
This class that corresponds to the Vbox on the Game Page with the image of the kana and the text-field to the user answer.
HomePageController
This class is the JavaFX controller of the 'home' page of the application.
JapaneseSyllable
Enumerate which contains all japanese syllable with parameters (alphabetic order and syllable translate in romanji)
JavaFXControllable
This interface contains some default methods that use by all JavaFX controller class.
Kana
This class implements a generic kana (hiragana and katakana) which uses on GuessPane class.
KanaType
Enumerate which contains the two type of Kana.
PlayerScore
This class stored the final score and data of a player during a game.
RankingPageController
This class is the JavaFX controller of the 'ranking' page of the application.
ResultPageController
This class is the JavaFX controller of the 'result' page of the application.
StopWatchTask
This class is a task that we give of a Timer Thread to count the time of the player on Game Page.
